#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
ll maxi=0 ;
vector<vector<ll> > v ;
ll vis[100004] = {0} ;
int main()
{
    ll i,j,k,n,m,p,t;
    string s1,s2 ;
    cin >> t ;
    while(t--) {
        cin >> s1 ;
        cin >> s2 ;
        ll d ;
        cin >> d ;
        ll a[26] ={0} ;
        ll b[26] = {0} ;
        n = s1.size() ;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) a[s1[i]-'a']++ ;
        n = s2.size() ;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) b[s2[i]-'a']++ ;
        p = 0 ;
        for(i=0;i<26;i++) p += abs(a[i]-b[i]) ;
        if(p<=d) cout << "YES\n" ;
        else cout << "NO\n" ;
    }
    return 0 ;
}
